article_title: Selma-to-Montgomery re-enactment march arrives at Capitol

article_metadata.description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. (AP) - A group retracing the steps of the 1965 Selma-to-Montgomery voting rights march arrived Friday at the Alabama Capitol, calling for an end to new ballot restrictions enacted in the 50 years since the landmark Voting Rights Act.
